synopsis.text: First-year high school student, Saki Aoi, finds herself captivated by the charismatic allure of her senior, Makoto Hanaoka. Unaware of the school-wide knowledge that Makoto is a cross-dressing boy, Saki impulsively confesses her love for him. Upon revealing his hidden identity, Saki is unexpectedly intrigued and undeterred by Makoto's secret. Despite his initial rejection, Saki's resolve to win his heart only intensifies, leading her to seek advice from Makoto's protective childhood friend, Ryuji Taiga. As the trio spends more time together, they navigate through a complex web of emotions, uncovering hidden feelings and forging deep connections that challenge their relationships and personal struggles.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
